Acknowledgements

The Roundup Initative is a group of people that regularly work together to produce new releases of the Roundup Issue Tracker. We like to thank our community and all organisation and people that support us doing so with code, money, time, testing, reports, ideas and everything else that helped!

Announcement with changelog for current release.

2.5

2.5.0

Maintainer: John Rouillard

Release Manager: John Rouillard

Developer activity by changesets:

rouilj@ieee.org  222 *****************************************************

Other contributers:

Marcus Priesch - patch for issue 2551287

Paul Schwabauer - updates to gpg python module so it still works for Roundup.

Randy - reported issue 2551396

Tobias Herp - patch for issue 1895197

4bug of ChaMd5 Security Team H1 Group - XSS vulnerability report

pre 1.5.0

Go Ping, you rock! Also, go Common Ground, ekit.com and Bizar Software for letting me implement this system on their time.
